Detroit plays the Portland Trail Blazers after Cade Cunningham scored 40 points in the Detroit Pistons' 119-105 victory over the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Cunningham is shooting 45.0% and averaging 24.1 points for the Pistons.

In their last 10 games, the Pistons are 7-3, averaging 115.0 points, 43.8 rebounds, 26.6 assists, 9.7 steals and 4.2 blocks per game while shooting 47.2% from the field. Their opponents have averaged 115.4 points per game.

In their last 10 games, the Trail Blazers are 4-6, averaging 111.5 points, 44.4 rebounds, 24.9 assists, 7.5 steals and 4.6 blocks per game while shooting 47.3% from the field. Their opponents have averaged 118.7 points.
The Pistons have gone 8-8 at home. Detroit is 6-10 in games decided by 10 points or more.
The Trail Blazers have gone 4-14 away from home. Portland has a 4-2 record in games decided by less than 4 points.

The Pistons' 13.4 made 3-pointers per game this season are only 0.6 fewer made shots on average than the 14.0 per game the Trail Blazers give up. The Trail Blazers average 11.9 made 3-pointers per game this season, 2.1 fewer made shots on average than the 14.0 per game the Pistons allow.
Deni Avdija is scoring 13.7 points per game with 6.2 rebounds and 3.2 assists for the Trail Blazers.
